body:
## Expected Behavior
Tests pass

## Actual Behavior
Sometimes tests randomly fail. I've seen this occur on local development environment and in Kite server. Getting it to reproduce is random, but once it reproduces, it fails pretty consistently until you reset the environment.

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

See attached logs:
[temporal-server_build_1417_golang-unit-test.log](https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/files/4867572/temporal-server_build_1417_golang-unit-test.log)
## Specifications

  - Version:
  - Platform:
title: Matching service unit tests are flaky
